body_html:
Hey , I solved the error .
This happens because the ground truth would have been an image of a different format ( PIL image has the format of 1xHxW ), So reshaping the GT solves the error. Also , make sure that the image consists of only one channel. Multiple channels in GT also leads to this error.

body:
Hey , I solved the error .
This happens because the ground truth would have been an image of a different format ( PIL image has the format of 1xHxW ), So reshaping the GT solves the error. Also , make sure that the image consists of only one channel. Multiple channels in GT also leads to this error.
